definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be in pain (Aram. [[כְּאֵב]], ke0b id.; Ar. kay’iba be sorrowful, sad; As. in deriv., ikkibu, pain Zim:BP 67, kêbtu, ruin Hpt in KAT:2 Gloss. i.)—
be in pain, physical Ge 34:25 (J, as result of circumcision); Job 14:22 (subj. [[בָּשָׂר]]; poet. of body in grave ‖[[נַפְשׁוֹ תֶּאֱבָָל]]).
of mental pain Pr 14:13 (subj. [[לֵב]]; prob. also Ps 69:30 (‖[[עָנִי]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 s. sf. [[הִכְאַבְתִּיו]] Ez Eze 13:22; 2 fpl. [[הִכְאַבְתֶּן]] v:Eze 13:22 LXX Targum Co (MT [[הַכְאוֹת]] v. [[כָּאָה]]); Impf. [[יַכְאִיב]] Job 5:18; [[תַּכְאִ֫בוּ]] 2Ki 3:19; Pt. [[מַכְאִב]] Ez Eze 28:24; —pain, mar;
of enemies of Isr. under fig. of thorn causing pain (no object expr.) ´[[קוֹץ מַכ]] Ez Eze 28:24 (‖[[מַמְאִיר סִלּוֹן]]); of [[שַׁדַּי]], no obj. expr., Job 5:18 (opp. [[חָבַשׁ]], ‖[[מָחַץ]].
of mental pain, obj. [[לֵב]], Ez Eze 13:22 (subj. false prophetesses, v. supr.); cf. v:Eze 13:22 (subj. ´[[י]]).
(si vera l.) of marring good land with stones 2Ki 3:19, LXX a/xreiw/sete (Klo [[תְּאַבְּדוּ]]).
